job.title: site reliability engineer senior (Seattle OR Chicago OR Phoenix)
job.description: ullithis role is a hybrid digitaloffice based position based out of one Starbucks technology hubs Seattle WA  Chicago IL  Phoenix AZbrliulIf youve got what it takes to help transform one of the most iconic brands in the world into a lean efficient and highly automated platform wed like to talk to youbrbrAs a Sr Site Reliability Engineer you will be responsible for the daytoday maintenance operational support and reliability of Internetbased and in store systems On an ongoing basis this position will help identify root causes of operational issues and partner with other team members to drive resolution This role will be also responsible for planning and execution of work within the Starbucks Retail Technology teambrbrAn effective Sr Site Reliability Engineer will be detail oriented have broad technical understanding within the domain can work independently and is a team performer Success will require collaboration ingenuity and passion to deliver resultsbrbrAs a member of our team you will play an important role in defining how we do reliability engineering It will require you to learn refine and document systems and processes Your experience with Service Level Indicators SLIs Service Level Objectives SLOs and error budgets will help us develop our practice You will be data driven in pursuit of reliability Most importantly you will proactively build relationships and exceed expectationsbrbrThis role requires your AGame technical proficiency experience in enterprise systems and the courage to drive change required So if you believe like we do that a cup of coffee can change a life and change our world come check us out and help us deliver that same amazing experience to our customers around the globebrbrModels and acts in accordance with Starbucks guiding principlesbrbrstronguSummary Of Key ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongemLeadershipbremulliHave an opinion Help influence and drive technical decisions within team and with stakeholdersliliBe assertive Provide awareness on options to problems and opportunities within and around platformliliDemonstrate accountability Initiate organize and drive individual or team development effortsliliCommunicate effectively Provide clear concise updates on individual or team development effortsbrliulemProduction SupportbremulliProvide 247 global support of services in rotating oncall rotationliliCreate and maintain system and training documentationliliRepresent team and act as point of escalation during a service interruption or planned maintenanceliliDefine track and alert on Service Level Indicators SLIs and Service Level Objectives SLOsliliUse New Relic Splunk and Pager Duty to identify then resolve complex issuesliliDrive root cause analysis remediation and planning after a service interruptionliliCoordinate with team to deploy fixes configuration changes system patches and certificate renewalsliliComplete application server builds and database refreshes in both production and nonproduction environmentsbrliulemSolution Design  DevelopmentbremulliActively participates in design sessions team planning and backlog groomingliliPositively influences others to collaborate towards a single approachliliParticipates in peer reviews using Git and can drive release process for a work itemliliCreates or updates Chef recipes and Jenkins pipeline configuration as neededliliRead write and execute PowerShell scripts or modules for repetitive tasksbrliulstronguBasic Qualificationsbrustrongulli46 years supporting external customer facing web services for a large sitelili46 years managing Windowsbased systems and services using IIS and MSSQL lili23 years using Chef to manage servers in Windows environmentlili23 years using Splunk New Relic and Pager Duty to support a large environmentlili23 years managing VIPs pools and members on F5 Big IPliliOutstanding troubleshooting attention to detail written and spoken communication skillsliliExperience defining Service Level Indicators SLIs and Service Level Objectives SLOs brliulstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongulli23 years using Jenkins for test build and or deploymentbrliulstronguIdeal QualificationsbrustrongulliExperience with performance tuning and scaling of IIS site using MSSQL databaseliliExperience automating alert and incident resolutionbrliulemStarbucks and its brands are an
